article_title: Country music legend Charlie Daniels has an important question for Obama

og.description: On Wednesday Daniels suggested what may be the cause of the problem.
og.title: Country music legend Charlie Daniels has an important question for Obama

article_summary:
Country music legend Charlie Daniels tweeted on Tuesday what many of us were already thinking.
Doubtful — Charlie Daniels (@CharlieDaniels) November 3, 2015Somebody in Washington needs to admit that we’re fighting a proxy war in Syria — Charlie Daniels (@CharlieDaniels) November 3, 2015He didn’t get any argument from social media users.
Liberalism-Always attack the symptom,never the cause Never light a candle while there’s an opportunity to curse the darkness — Charlie Daniels (@CharlieDaniels) November 4, 2015
He asked if anyone in the Obama administration has a clue what’s going on in the Middle East.
I wonder if there’s anybody in the Obama administration who knows what’s actually happening in the Middle East.
